Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 80th overall pick, by New York (N) in 1982...
Injured on 6/9/1982 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/12/1985 with a Inflamed Achilles Tendon, out for one week...
Traded from New York (N) to Cincinnati on 7/31/1987 (Going to CIN: SS E. Yelding, RF B. Distefano. Going to NYM: CF A. Dawson)...
Had first career hit (double) on 9/15/1987, off Kurt Kepshire (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/10/1988, off Joe Johnson (STL)...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1992, hitting .356 with 8 HR, 18 RBI...
Hit 3 homeruns against St. Louis, driving in 6 runs on 6/22/1993...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1994, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (N) on 7/13/1994...
Hit for the cycle against St. Louis on 8/30/1994...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1995, hitting .435 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1996, hitting .529 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
